abstract: JPMorgan Chase‘s deal to buy Bear Stearns may have thrown a wrench into Bank of America‘s plans to sell its prime brokerage business.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase‘s deal to buy Bear Stearns may have thrown a wrench into Bank of America‘s plans to sell its prime brokerage business.

headline.main: Bank of America May Scrap Prime Brokerage Sale, Report Says
